The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 May is 41,946 (4,855 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 April, there were 142 new confirmed cases (16.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 April, there were 132 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (10 extra cases).
